Class RefuteOptionPane

java.lang.Object
RefuteOptionPane
public class RefuteOptionPane
extends java.lang.Object
RefuteOptionPane is a custom JOptionPane that uses a JComboBox to allow a refuting Player to choose which Card they would like to refute.
Author:
johnh

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    RefuteOptionPane​(java.util.List<Card> options, Player refuting, Player original)
    Constructs a new RefuteOptionPane that pops up letting a Player choose their card to refute.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private javax.swing.JPanel createOptionPanel​(javax.swing.JComboBox<java.lang.String> cb)
    Creates a new JPanel containing the JComboBox with all the Card options:

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • RefuteOptionPane

      public RefuteOptionPane​(java.util.List<Card> options, Player refuting, Player original)
      Constructs a new RefuteOptionPane that pops up letting a Player choose their card to refute.
      Parameters:
      options - the List of Cards that can be refuted
      refuting - the refuting Player
      original - the Player that made the guess
